3TT.F.summary: Tecnotree Oyj provides telecom IT solutions products and services for charging, billing, customer care, and messaging and content services in the, Europe and Americas, the Middle East, Africa, and the Asia Pacific. The company's product portfolio comprises a range of business management solutions for digital service providers, as well as a range of order-to-cash of business process and subscription management for telecom and other digital service providers. Its solutions include Digital Commerce Suite, a marketplace to purchase and subscriber to owned and partnered offerings, Digital BSS Suite for enterprise business, VAS Consolidation services; and BSS Switch. The company also provides managed, maintenance and support, and consulting services. It enables its customers to monetize and transform their business into a marketplace of digital services. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Espoo, Finland.

9H0.F.summary: Enersize Oyj provides online compressed air management software. It offers LEAQS, a leakage management software; Q+ online measurement and monitoring software; and Q+ automated real-time analysis & optimization software. The company provides its solutions for leakage management, measurement, data acquisition, and automated analysis of the compressed air systems operations based on IoT and cloud computing. The company is headquartered in Helsinki, Finland.

ADMCM.HE.summary: Admicom Oyj engages in the ERP management system development business in Finland. The company offers cloud based business management system solutions; accounting, payroll, and controller services; and training, and customer support services. It serves building engineers, and construction and industrial professionals. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in JyvÃ¤skylÃ¤, Finland.

BAS1V.HE.summary: Basware Oyj provides networked purchase-to-pay solutions, and e-invoicing and financing services in Finland and internationally. It offers analytics, travel and expense management, sourcing, and e-procurement solutions; and solutions for accounts receivable and payable. The company also provides financing services solutions, including Basware Discount, a solution that offers discount for early payment; and Basware Pay, a payment solution. It serves customers in healthcare, energy and utilities, public sector and non-profit, manufacturing, retail and leisure, construction, transport and logistics, finance and insurance, software and telecoms. The company was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Espoo, Finland.

BILOT.HE.summary: Bilot Oyj, a software and IT service company, provides digital services and solutions in Finland. It offers solutions in the areas of customer experience marketing, sales, commerce, and service; and data strategy and governance, data management, business intelligence and advanced analytics, artificial intelligence, and machine learning. The company also provides service design and user experience, business process, integration, and custom solutions. It serves companies in process, manufacturing, wholesale, retail, services, consumer products, and food industries. The company was incorporated in 2005 and is headquartered in Helsinki, Finland.

BWV.F.summary: Basware Oyj provides networked purchase-to-pay solutions, and e-invoicing and financing services in Finland and internationally. It offers analytics, travel and expense management, sourcing, and e-procurement solutions; and solutions for accounts receivable and payable. The company also provides financing services solutions, including Basware Discount, a solution that offers discount for early payment; and Basware Pay, a payment solution. It serves customers in healthcare, energy and utilities, public sector and non-profit, manufacturing, retail and leisure, construction, transport and logistics, finance and insurance, software and telecoms. The company was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Espoo, Finland.

DIGIGR.HE.summary: Digitalist Group Plc provides digital solutions and services for digitalizing industries in Europe and the North America. The company offers Ticknovate, a cloud-based software product for selling and booking tickets; LeanLaban, a platform for building, understanding, and enabling collaborative development with customers and personnel; and Digitalist Experience Store, a proprietary white label App store content platform. It also provides design services, which include digital, mobile, and web design, as well as service and industrial design; and business performance enhancement and prototype services, as well as industry and market foresights. The company was formerly known as Ixonos plc and changed its name to Digitalist Group Plc in May 2017. Digitalist Group Plc was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Helsinki, Finland.

ENERS.ST.summary: Enersize Oyj provides online compressed air management software. It offers LEAQS, a leakage management software; Q+ online measurement and monitoring software; and Q+ automated real-time analysis & optimization software. The company provides its solutions for leakage management, measurement, data acquisition, and automated analysis of the compressed air systems operations based on IoT and cloud computing. The company is headquartered in Helsinki, Finland.

IFA1V.HE.summary: Innofactor Oyj provides digitalization and cloud solutions that focus on Microsoft platforms in the Nordic countries. It develops software products and services; and offers planning services for business-critical solutions, project deliveries, implementation support, and maintenance services. The company offers Dynasty 10, a software suite for information management processes; Innolog, a solution for monitoring of personal data files and log data management in the healthcare, and social services sectors; Membership Management System solution for customer relationship and operations management for trade unions and membership-based organizations; Prime, a solution that optimize and manage organizations resources; QualityFirst, a quality and management software suite; Skilli, a cloud-based learning analytics solution; and solutions for managing courses, events, and conferences. It also provides solutions in the areas of service design, websites and mobile apps, digital customer service and marketing automation, customer relationship management, enterprise resource planning, project and portfolio management, quality and management, case and document management, HR and talent management, digital collaboration and mobile work, cloud infrastructure, governance, security and GDPR, identity and access management, enterprise mobility and security, managed cloud services, advanced analytics and BI, and Internet of Things, as well as customized solutions. Innofactor Oyj was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Espoo, Finland.

LEADD.HE.summary: LeadDesk Oy operates as a cloud-based software company in Europe. The company also offers cloud services for high-volume sales and customer-service in the Nordic countries. In addition, it develops and supplies software for outbound sales, inbound sales, customer services, and pricing. The company serves customers in media, security service, energy, telecommunication, financial service, and market research industries. LeadDesk Oy was incorporated in 2009 and is headquartered in Helsinki, Finland.

QPR1V.HE.summary: QPR Software Oyj provides services and software tools for developing business processes and enterprise architecture in Finland, rest of Europe, Russia, Turkey, and internationally. It offers QPR ProcessAnalyzer, a process mining software; QPR EnterpriseArchitect, an enterprise architecture modeling software; and QPR Metrics, a performance management software product that automates strategy execution, operational performance management, people performance management, risk management, and project portfolio management. The company also provides QPR ProcessDesigner, a business process modeling tool to describe, analyze, communicate, and enhance processes; QPR Connectors that connects to various data sources and integrate data; and QPR Cloud, which offers solutions as a service for process mining, enterprise architecture, business process management, performance management, and quality management. In addition, it offers software maintenance and consulting services. The company sells its products through direct sales force, as well as through a network of resellers. QPR Software Oyj was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Helsinki, Finland.

QTCOM.HE.summary: Qt Group Oyj develops, productizes, and licenses software development tools under commercial and open source licenses Finland, Norway, Germany, the United States, Japan, China, South Korea, France, the United Kingdom, and India. It offers Qt Design Studio, a user interface design tool for applications; Qt Creator, a cross-platform integrated development environment for application development; and Qt Framework that contains C++ library classes and APIs to simplify application development. The company also provides professional, consulting, and training services. It offers its services to automotive, industrial automation, consumer electronics, and medical industries. The company is headquartered in Espoo, Finland.

QTGPF.summary: Qt Group Oyj develops, productizes, and licenses software development tools under commercial and open source licenses Finland, Norway, Germany, the United States, Japan, China, South Korea, France, the United Kingdom, and India. It offers Qt Design Studio, a user interface design tool for applications; Qt Creator, a cross-platform integrated development environment for application development; and Qt Framework that contains C++ library classes and APIs to simplify application development. The company also provides professional, consulting, and training services. It offers its services to automotive, industrial automation, consumer electronics, and medical industries. The company is headquartered in Espoo, Finland.

SOLTEQ.HE.summary: Solteq Oyj, an IT service and software company, provides digital business solutions and industry-specific software in Finland, Sweden, Norway, Denmark, Poland, and the United Kingdom. The company offers Solteq Cloud POS, a point-of sale (POS) solution for cafeteria, lunch restaurants, events, and self-service needs; Solteq Tekso, a cash register system for fashion and hardware shops, other specialty shops, and grocery retail; and Solteq Order Engine that is tailored to individual customer needs. It also provides Solteq Robotics for customized packages and continuous service; and Solteq Retail Robot, which moves inside a store to recognize products, empty or hole shelves, and incorrect price tags, as well as builds 3D maps of stores with product locations and integrates to the POS, PIM, planogram, and ERP systems. In addition, the company offers inPulse4Utilities that provides tools for digital customer engagement for district heating, water supply, and energy companies; inWorks, which offers browser-based customer data management and invoicing systems; and Solteq Smart Dealer, which offers automotive and aftermarket products. Further, it provides Solteq WebService, a cloud-based ERP system for vehicle maintenance and after-sales services; Trafi Âquery, a search portal for accessing up-to-date vehicle and customer information from the Trafi ATJ database; Customer Data Refreshment, which offers up to date customer data; Solteq Care, an electronic journal system, for municipality health care; and Solteq Tooth, a dental system for handling records and patient-oriented administrative tasks. The company was formerly known as Tampereen Tiedonhallinta. Solteq Oyj was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Vantaa, Finland.

SOPRA.HE.summary: Soprano Oyj, together with its subsidiaries, operates as a service business development company in the Nordic region. It offers management, communication, and ICT training services. The company is headquartered in Helsinki, Finland.

TEM1V.HE.summary: Tecnotree Oyj provides telecom IT solutions products and services for charging, billing, customer care, and messaging and content services in the, Europe and Americas, the Middle East, Africa, and the Asia Pacific. The company's product portfolio comprises a range of business management solutions for digital service providers, as well as a range of order-to-cash of business process and subscription management for telecom and other digital service providers. Its solutions include Digital Commerce Suite, a marketplace to purchase and subscriber to owned and partnered offerings, Digital BSS Suite for enterprise business, VAS Consolidation services; and BSS Switch. The company also provides managed, maintenance and support, and consulting services. It enables its customers to monetize and transform their business into a marketplace of digital services. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Espoo, Finland.

It develops software products and services; and offers planning services for business-critical solutions, project deliveries, implementation support, and maintenance services. The company offers Dynasty 10, a software suite for information management processes; Innolog, a solution for monitoring of personal data files and log data management in the healthcare, and social services sectors; Membership Management System solution for customer relationship and operations management for trade unions and membership-based organizations; Prime, a solution that optimize and manage organizations resources; QualityFirst, a quality and management software suite; Skilli, a cloud-based learning analytics solution; and solutions for managing courses, events, and conferences. It also provides solutions in the areas of service design, websites and mobile apps, digital customer service and marketing automation, customer relationship management, enterprise resource planning, project and portfolio management, quality and management, case and document management, HR and talent management, digital collaboration and mobile work, cloud infrastructure, governance, security and GDPR, identity and access management, enterprise mobility and security, managed cloud services, advanced analytics and BI, and Internet of Things, as well as customized solutions. Innofactor Oyj was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Espoo, Finland.

VINCIT.HE.summary: Vincit Oyj provides software development services. It offers electronic services and information systems; browser-based HTML5 services and mobile applications for smartphone platforms; develops measurement and medical equipment software; and provides service design. The company was formerly known as Vincit Group Oyj and changed its name to Vincit Oyj in May 2018. Vincit Oyj is based in Tampere, Finland.
